title: Operation Grapple: Testing Britain's First H-bomb
description:
Operation Grapple: Testing Britain's First H-bomb By K. Hubbard, M. Simmons
 Littlehampton Book Services Ltd | 1985 | 128 Pages | ISBN: 0711015147 | PDF | 76 MB


 Frontispiece photograph of the explosion, Title page, Glossary of terms and list of Contents; brief biographical details of the authors; Preface; 11 chapters detailing the preparation and planning for the first H bomb dropped by Britain. Detailed aircraft information with plans and photographs. Full account of the drop day and information about the aftermath. GP Capt Hubbard's experiences as commander of No 49 Squadron 1956/7.
